General.Name: New Talisman Gold Mines Ltd
General.Description: New Talisman Gold Mines Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the mine development and mineral exploration activities in New Zealand and Vanuatu. It primarily explores for gold and silver deposits. The company holds a 100% interest in the Talisman gold project. It is also involved in the share investment activity. New Talisman Gold Mines Limited was founded in 1894 and is headquartered in Auckland, New Zealand.

0.Name: Mr. A. Victor Rabone B.E.
